item.title: New York Helicopter Tour: City Lights Skyline Experience
item.description: See the sights of New York City from up in the air on this nighttime helicopter tour of the city. Take off, and soar over the NYC as you take in aerial views of some of the most famous sights. See the Statue of Liberty, the Rockefeller Center, and Times Square all lit up, and then pass over the George Washington Bridge. This adventure is a shared experience with other travelers.

image.alt: New York Helicopter Tour: City Lights Skyline Experience

item.title: New York Helicopter Tour: City Skyline Experience
item.description: Get aerial views of the Manhattan skyline and other New York highlights during this short helicopter flight over New York City. With a small group of fellow passengers, marvel at the most famous sights and snap photos from a bird's eye view. This adventure is a shared experience with other travelers.

image.alt: New York Helicopter Tour: City Skyline Experience

item.title: New York:3-Day Niagara Falls US,Washington DC Tour w/3rd&4th Free
item.description: Discover the East Coast beyond New York with this 3-day, multi-stop tour. Travel to Washington D.C. via Philadelphia to explore the nation's capital. Continue on to visit Corning and the US side of Niagara Falls, with the option to ride the iconic Maid of the Mist, visit Cave of the Winds, and more (all activities at an additional cost).

image.alt: New York:3-Day Niagara Falls US,Washington DC Tour w/3rd&4th Free

item.title: The Escape Game New Jersey: 60-Minute Adventure at American Dream
item.description:
Our NJ location features 6 immersive escape rooms, including our newest game, The Depths, and our most difficult adventure, Prison Break. Each escape room holds up to 8 players excluding Playground, which can accommodate up to 12 players.
These adventures offer a one-of-a-kind premium experience. Follow clues and solve puzzles to complete your mission together. We offer the best escape rooms and the fastest customer support. Come see why our escape rooms win awards.
We offer shared experiences, which means multiple groups can book into the same game. If you would like to ensure a private experience, make sure to book all available spots. If the available spots do not match the game capacity, that means another group has already booked spots in this game.

image.alt: The Escape Game New Jersey: 60-Minute Adventure at American Dream

item.title: 2-Hour Sunset Safari Eco Cruise from Cape May
item.description: Discover the wildlife of the Cape May wetlands during this sunset cruise. Climb aboard a boat and set out on a tour focused on coastline birds and wildlife. As the sun sets, cruise into the salt marshes behind Cape May and Wildwood to observe and photograph several species of birds. Admire views of the marine life and learn about their ecosystem during this tour.

image.alt: 2-Hour Sunset Safari Eco Cruise from Cape May

item.title: Wetlands Safari Eco-Cruise in Cape May (Birding By Boat)
item.description: We get views of the wildlife of the salt marsh that people almost never have an opportunity to see. We sail daily from April until October so we always know where we are likely to see the most interesting birds and with 25 years of experience running these tours we know where we are likely to have the best trip. Our route varies daily depending on conditions.

image.alt: Wetlands Safari Eco-Cruise in Cape May (Birding By Boat)

item.title: Two Person Ar-15 and 9mm Pistol Package!
item.description: Choose from over 300 types of guns to rent while on this Woodland Park shooting package at one of the largest gun ranges in the US, in New Jersey, just 15 minutes from New York City. You must be in a pair, or you can add a third person for an additional cost. No single shooters allowed. You will also receive training on how to hit bullseye from a Range Safety Officer.

image.alt: Two Person Ar-15 and 9mm Pistol Package!

item.title: 5 Star Shameless Name Dropping Walking Tour of Campus & Einstein's Neighborhood
item.description: Explore Princeton, New Jersey, on this guided walking tour. Feel like an insider as you learn about the history of Princeton University while you discover the must-see campus sites, including Nassau Hall, Princeton Chapel, Prospect Garden, Blair Hall, Rockefeller College, and more. Then, venture beyond the school to see the former homes of Albert Einstein, F. Scott Fitzgerald, T.S. Eliot, Woodrow Wilson, Grover Cleveland, and others.

image.alt: 5 Star Shameless Name Dropping Walking Tour of Campus & Einstein's Neighborhood

item.title: New York City Skyline Helicopter Tour from New Jersey
item.description:
See breathtaking views of New York City as you fly into the city from Essex County Airport in New Jersey. Essex County airport in New Jersey is accessible by a 45-minute taxi ride from Midtown or via public transportation from the Port Authority Building in NYC on 42nd Street.
Sit back for the ride of your life on your 30–35-minute journey showcasing iconic landmarks like the American Dream Mall and Metlife Stadium before reaching the Statue of Liberty, One World Trade Center, the Empire State Building, and more.
A once in a lifetime experience you are sure to never stop talking about!

image.alt: New York City Skyline Helicopter Tour from New Jersey

item.title: Whale and Dolphin Watching Cruise from Cape May
item.description: Take a break from the beach on a sightseeing cruise off the coast of Cape May. As your captain navigates to the best locations for spotting whales, dolphins, and porpoises, your certified naturalist guide offers live commentary about the area’s ocean life and the animals’ natural habitat. The boat is fully equipped with wheelchair access, bathrooms, and a snack bar for your convenience.

image.alt: Whale and Dolphin Watching Cruise from Cape May

item.title: Dolphin Watching around Cape May
item.description: Get the chance to see dolphins off the coast of Cape May on this dolphin-watching cruise. Make yourself comfortable on the boat and keep a close watch on the water for jumping and swimming dolphins, in pods that can number from five to 500. Listen as your captain narrates the tour with facts and figures about Cape May, as well as dolphin biology and behavior.

image.alt: Dolphin Watching around Cape May

item.title: Niagara Falls USA 2-Day Tour from New York City with 3rd&4th Free
item.description: Discover Niagara Falls, and other regional highlight, on this 2-day tour from New York City. Stop at the Corning Museum of Glass and Watkins Glen State Park (optional tours, with extra expense), head to Niagara for a night tour with fireworks show. The next morning, discover the best of the region, including a Maid of the Mist trip (separate expense) in season, before returning to New York.

image.alt: Niagara Falls USA 2-Day Tour from New York City with 3rd&4th Free

item.title: Dinner Cruise with Dolphin Watching from Cape May
item.description: Discover Cape May from the water with a scenic dinner cruise. Climb aboard a boat and keep an eye out for dolphins and whales during the tour in Delaware Bay. Witness sunset from the boat as you cruise by local landmarks including the Cape May Lighthouse, Sunset Beach, and Wildwood Beach. Dinner and parking at the marina are included.

image.alt: Dinner Cruise with Dolphin Watching from Cape May

item.title: Ricks Cafe Sunset Catamaran & Snorkeling Cruise Negril and Mobay
item.description: This tour combines a catamaran cruise, snorkeling excursion, and sunset stop at Rick's Cafe—allowing you to experience multiple island highlights in one day. Board a catamaran party boat and cruise along Negril's coastline, stopping to snorkel at a coral reef and see tropical fish and maybe sea turtles or rays. A domestic open bar on board the boat and hotel pickup and drop-off are included.

image.alt: Ricks Cafe Sunset Catamaran & Snorkeling Cruise Negril and Mobay

item.title: NORTHLANDZ GROUP TICKET FOR 4 (Indoor Only)
item.description: Get up close and personal with the world’s largest model railroad—complete with more than 8 miles (13 kilometers) of tracks—when you visit New Jersey’s Northlandz museum. Book tickets before you travel to guarantee your admission and, once inside, explore at your own pace. You’ll want plenty of time to admire the highly detailed miniatures, follow the twining tracks and bridges, and watch the trains chug by.

image.alt: NORTHLANDZ GROUP TICKET FOR 4 (Indoor Only)

item.title: 5-day Niagara Falls, Toronto, Ottawa, Montreal & Quebec City Tour
item.description: Visit four spectacular cities in Eastern Canada—Toronto, Ottawa, Montreal, and Quebec—on this 5-day excursion from New York City. On the first day, experience Niagara Falls illuminated at night. Then, travel to Toronto, where you’ll head to the top of the Skylon Tower to see the falls. Enjoy authentic French food in Quebec (at your own expense), marvel at the Notre Dame Basilica in Montreal, and visit the Ausable Chasm in upstate New York. Groups of more than four guests or those that desire separate rooms should complete separate bookings. If you have more than one booking, be sure to provide the confirmation numbers in order to travel together.

image.alt: 5-day Niagara Falls, Toronto, Ottawa, Montreal & Quebec City Tour

item.title: Private EWR Airport transfer / New York City (One Way)
item.description: Reserve reliable transportation for your arrival to New York City with this private transfer from Newark Airport to Manhattan. Get picked up curbside at Newark Airport in New Jersey and receive help with your luggage. Travel in the comfort of an air-conditioned vehicle to the address of your choice in Manhattan. Flight monitoring is included. The reverse route, from Manhattan to Newark Airport, is also available.

image.alt: Private EWR Airport transfer / New York City (One Way)

item.title: Washington D.C.& Philadelphia 2-Day Tour from New York City
item.description: Visit Philadelphia and Washington D.C. and see numerous important landmarks with this overnight tour from New York City. Visit the Independence National Historical Park in Philadelphia. In Washington D.C., visit the exterior of the Capitol, Supreme Court, and the White House, various memorials, and enjoy a nighttime bus tour around the city.

image.alt: Washington D.C.& Philadelphia 2-Day Tour from New York City

item.title: American Dream DreamWorks Indoor Water Park Ticket
item.description: Open year round, and one of the largest indoor water parks in the country, DreamWorks Indoor Water Park is a family-friendly destination located just a few miles from New York City—and this advance booking option enables a stress-free visiting experience. Book your tickets before you travel, and arrive at a time that works best for you. You can explore highlights like its many slides, indoor wave pool and more, all at your leisure.

image.alt: American Dream DreamWorks Indoor Water Park Ticket

item.title: Private Walking Tour of Hoboken, Only Half a Mile from Manhattan!
item.description:
Join me on a private walking tour of Hoboken, a charming waterfront city only half-a-mile (0,8km) west of Manhattan, across the Hudson River. Look it up on Google Maps!
Hoboken is an oft-overlooked gem whose skyline views, riverfront parks, industrial past, immigrant influences, brownstones, cafes, shops and food offer a unique look at local life and history.
Accessible from Manhattan via ferry (5-10 mins), train (10-15 mins) or Uber/Lyft. Choose MEET IN HOBOKEN or MEET IN MANHATTAN when booking. Contact us to determine the best option for your group.
Step away from New York City's tourist crowds — feel like you're visiting a friend — leave with a better understanding of local life!
*Scroll down for full itinerary (under ITINERARY or WHAT TO EXPECT). Certain mobile apps do not show these details, so you may need to view on the web.*
Operated by Viamo Tours, LLC
Hosted by Greg Guglielmo
I've been giving tours for years and began publishing online in 2023
Parlo un po' d'italiano

image.alt: Private Walking Tour of Hoboken, Only Half a Mile from Manhattan!

item.title: Taste of New York Helicopter Tour from Kearny, NJ
item.description: Get unobstructed views of the New York City skyline and the Statue of Liberty on this helicopter tour. With a small group of just six people or fewer, you'll enjoy an intimate atmosphere while hovering above New York's most famous attractions. Listen to in-depth commentary from your guide, see more of the city in less time, and take advantage of the chance for epic aerial photo ops from your bird's-eye view of Manhattan.

image.alt: Taste of New York Helicopter Tour from Kearny, NJ

item.title: LEGOLAND Discovery Center Westchester Admission Ticket
item.description: Kids — and accompanying grown-ups — will find no end to challenging their imaginations at LEGOLAND® Discovery Center Westchester, located in Yonkers. Spend an activity-filled day of LEGO®-building fun at multiple attractions, from constructing cities from LEGO bricks to testing the fastest vehicle at LEGO Racers. View New York City landmarks at Miniland and relax at the 4D Cinema with a LEGO movie. Brave adventurers can tackle rides like Merlin’s Apprentice and Kingdom Quest Laser Ride, while little ones find playtime action at the DUPLO® Village.

image.alt: LEGOLAND Discovery Center Westchester Admission Ticket

item.title: The Hook at Caesars Atlantic City
item.description:
The HOOK is an uproariously funny, adults-only homage to Atlantic City’s glorious golden age of live entertainment. Set inside the restored Warner Theater, The HOOK is irresistibly sexy, provocative and full of jaw-dropping acrobatic acts that unfold right in front of your eyes – like literally pretty much almost practically in your lap.
Your host, Dick Marlin, and his chorus-line of exotic lobsters are determined to deliver a night of entertainment you will never forget. So grab a cocktail, take a seat and get ready to be swept away by a riptide of laughs, pearl-clutching surprises and stunning performances. It’s a bonafide OM-Sea spectacular for audiences ages 18 and above.
Dine before or after the show in Superfrico, located backstage of the theater.

image.alt: The Hook at Caesars Atlantic City

item.title: Kearny, NJ: Highlights of NYC Helicopter Tour
item.description: There’s no better way to see New York than from the air and helicopter tours don’t have to cost the earth. Feel the history as you soar above Ellis Island, Wall Street, Brooklyn Bridge and more on this short but perfectly tailored flight that brings you eye to eye with the iconic Statue of Liberty. Choose between multiple departures throughout the day, with a maximum of six travelers per flight.

image.alt: Kearny, NJ: Highlights of NYC Helicopter Tour
